text:
Pangea - Chicago, IL and Mexico City, Mexico

Full Stack .NET Software Engineer who are comfortable working on Macbook Pros and understand that .NET is just a tool, not a lifestyle.

Spanish fluency and strong front-end skills a big plus.

Full description at http://pnga.co/1kbNp87.

Apply by emailing jobs@gopangea.com or via Careers Stack Overflow (http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/47428/full-stack-net-e...)
